name: Send Slack notification to assignees in a Notion database
description:
Use this template to automatically send a Slack message to an assignee in a Notion database.

Make regularly checks the Notion database and retrieves databases items (pages) that meet certain criteria. See our basic [database](https://www.notion.so/0af26523eee3492a87a7868fe8e8be80?v=135293d52bdb4f4cbf4abffe91b5c910) for reference.
